Uses of Class
it.polimi.se2018.controller.ControllerState

  • Packages that use ControllerState 
    Package Description
    it.polimi.se2018.controller  
    it.polimi.se2018.model  

    • Uses of ControllerState in it.polimi.se2018.controller

      Subclasses of ControllerState in it.polimi.se2018.controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChangeDiceValueControllerState
      This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can change the value of the drafted dice
      class  ChangeDiceValueUnitaryControllerState
      This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can increment or decrement a dice value
      class  ChooseFromTrackControllerState
      This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can draft a dice from the track
      class  DraftControllerState
      This is the state during which the current player can draft a dice from draftpool.
      class  EndControllerState
      This is the state during which the current player can only end the turn.
      class  EndToolCardEffectControllerState
      This is an implicit state that ends automatically the effect of the current used toolcard.
      class  EnforceTrackChosenColorSimilarityControllerState
      This is an implicit state that enforces the constraint on any following die move that the dice to be moved be of the same color of the die chosen from the track.
      class  MoveControllerState
      This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can move a dice from a cell of the own windowpattern to another cell of the own windowpattern.
      class  PlaceControllerState
      This is the state in which the current player can place a dice on the own windowPattern.
      class  RerollDraftedControllerState
      This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can reroll drafted dice.
      class  RerollDraftPoolControllerState
      This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can reroll all dices in draftpool.
      class  RollOverDraftedControllerState
      This is the state during which, due to a toolcard, current player can roll over drafted dice.
      class  SkipNextTurnControllerState
      Implicit state that as implicit behaviour removes next turn of current player.
      class  StartControllerState
      This is the initial state of each turn during which current player can draft a dice or use a toolcard.
      class  SwapDraftedWithTrackControllerState
      This is an implicit state that switch drafted dice with selected dice from track.
      class  SwitchDraftedWithBagControllerState
      This is an implicit state that switches drafted dice with one random drafted from dicebag.
      class  ToolCardControllerState
      This is the state in which current player can use a toolcard.
      Fields in it.polimi.se2018.controller declared as ControllerState 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ControllerState Controller.controllerState
      The current state of the Controller
      Methods in it.polimi.se2018.controller that return ControllerState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ControllerState ControllerStateManager.getNextState(ControllerState prevState)
      Based on the active toolCard, decides what is the new state that the connected controller should take
      Methods in it.polimi.se2018.controller with parameters of type ControllerState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ControllerState ControllerStateManager.getNextState(ControllerState prevState)
      Based on the active toolCard, decides what is the new state that the connected controller should take
      protected void Controller.setControllerState(ControllerState controllerState)
      Set as current state the one passed as method's argument

    • Uses of ControllerState in it.polimi.se2018.model

      Methods in it.polimi.se2018.model with parameters of type ControllerState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String ToolCard.nextStateID(ControllerState currentState)
      Returns the ID of the next state given the current state, after having queried the tool card's state transition table.
